plot: On a cold winter morning, a small van is stopped by soldiers on a mountain road. The occupants are an elderly couple who try to save their son from being recruited by hiding him in a coffin.
title: La sentence
plot_es: On a cold winter morning, a small van is stopped by soldiers on a mountain road. The occupants are an elderly couple who try to save their son from being recruited by hiding him in a coffin.
plot_en: On a cold winter morning, a small van is stopped by soldiers on a mountain road. The occupants are an elderly couple who try to save their son from being recruited by hiding him in a coffin.
